SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.BBS_KEY, A.BBS_PARENT_KEY, TO_CHAR(A.INDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as indate, A.TITLE, A.WRITE_USER_KEY, A.READ_COUNT, LEVEL, CONTENTS, (SELECT COUNT(BBS_COMMNET_KEY) FROM T_BBS_COMMENT T WHERE T.BBS_KEY = A.BBS_KEY) commentCount FROM T_BBS_DATA A WHERE A.is_notice = 0 AND A.CTG_KEY = #{teacherKey} AND A.BBS_MASTER_KEY = 10025 START WITH A.BBS_PARENT_KEY = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.BBS_KEY = A.BBS_PARENT_KEY ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.BBS_PARENT_KEY DESC, A.BBS_KEY DESC ) Z WHERE 1=1
AND Z.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND Z.CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND Z.WRITE_USER_KEY IN ( SELECT USER_KEY FROM T_USER WHERE 1=1 AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' )
OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimitNumber} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(Z.BBS_KEY) FROM ( SELECT A.BBS_KEY, A.BBS_PARENT_KEY, TO_CHAR(A.INDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as indate, A.TITLE, A.WRITE_USER_KEY, A.READ_COUNT, LEVEL, CONTENTS FROM T_BBS_DATA A WHERE A.is_notice = 0 AND A.CTG_KEY = #{teacherKey} AND A.BBS_MASTER_KEY = 10025 START WITH A.BBS_PARENT_KEY = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.BBS_KEY = A.BBS_PARENT_KEY ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.BBS_PARENT_KEY DESC, A.BBS_KEY DESC ) Z WHERE 1=1
AND Z.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND Z.CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND Z.WRITE_USER_KEY IN ( SELECT USER_KEY FROM T_USER WHERE 1=1 AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' )

SELECT A.BBS_KEY, TO_CHAR(A.INDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as indate, A.TITLE, A.READ_COUNT, B.NAME as userName, B.USER_ID, A.WRITE_USER_KEY, A.CONTENTS FROM T_BBS_DATA A INNER JOIN T_USER B ON A.WRITE_USER_KEY = B.USER_KEY WHERE BBS_KEY = #{bbsKey}

SELECT A.BBS_COMMNET_KEY as bbsCommentKey, B.NAME as userName, TO_CHAR(A.INDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as indate, A.COMMENT_ as commentContents FROM T_BBS_COMMENT A INNER JOIN T_USER B ON A.USER_KEY = B.USER_KEY WHERE BBS_KEY = #{bbsKey} ORDER BY A.BBS_COMMNET_KEY ASC
